article.title: U.S. Army Awards Cyber Network Defense Support Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ICF Jacob and Sundstrom, Baltimore, Maryland, was awarded a $9,166,600 firm-fixed-price, level-of-effort contract for the cyber network defense support provider services.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
